content.body: I think Java Streams is ok, but we should note it is intentionally named as "Stream", to make it clear it's not Iterable/Iterator. If we follow Java design, we should also consider change iterator helpers to "Stream". Actually I think Emitter proposal is a very similar and more powerful Stream-like API, a good alternative to iterator helpers.
